name: UFO TOWER
description:
Homeworld has come to rescue you from Area 51, but you can't reach the spaceship. Turn scientists into aliens and create a stack high enough to reach the ship. Avoid direct contact with humans and make sure the tower doesn't topple over!

CONTROLS

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

Made for GMTK Jam 2021, theme "Joined Together".

All art and code by me.

Song used is "サンダーカーブ" by Panic Pumpkin.
